page.title: 06BERWICK COASTGUARD.
page.content: THE MOBILE RESCUE UNIT. The M.R.U. carries lots of light rescue equipment,mainly for cliff rescues.It carries a few different kinds of flares and signal rockets.There are two cliff helmets for safety in rescues.There are life jackets,ropes and a stretcher,a two radio and a loud hailer to co-ordinate rescues and speak to the people in trouble.There are a lot of lights on the front of the M.R.U. and a flashing blue light on top.Mr Wood carries a large hammer and spade in the M.R.U. and he told us how dangerous it was to dig tunnels in sand.
